## FullscreenTool class

全屏

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FullscreenTool extends ToolBase<FullscreenToolOptions, FullscreenToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** [ToolBase](./core.toolbase)<!-- -->&lt;[FullscreenToolOptions](./core.fullscreentooloptions)<!-- -->, FullscreenToolEvents&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new FullscreenTool({
  target: HTMLElement
})

tool.enable()
tool.toggleFullscreen()
```
